summary: With this mod you can summon 9 mini Dragons, Mounts and -simple-Followers, wherever you want + you can dismiss easily the summonable Mounts + you can find 4 mini Dragons, -complete- Followers (with speech) inside Whiterun (near the south bulwarks).DRAGONBORN is required OR NOT (alternative .esp)
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][b][size="7"]Mini Dragons - Mounts and Followers[/size][/b] by gg77[/color] [color=#00ff00]version 1.1

Optional Files: An alternative Esp (-English version-) ONLY if you have not the DLC Dragonborn (No Spectral Dragon of course !) + Esp version Française pour la version 1.1 (Au choix: AVEC ou SANS le DLC Dragonborn)[/color]

With this mod you can summon 9 "mini" Dragons (icewraiths models), Mounts and -simple-Followers, wherever you want + you can dismiss easily the summonable Mounts (with a book/spell) + you can find 4 "mini" Dragons, -complete- Followers (with speech) inside Whiterun (near the south bulwarks) .

To access in Vvardenfell (Morrowind) and Cyrodiil (Oblivion) with these mounts you have the 2 mods WIP: [url=http://morroblivion.com/]SKYWIND and SKYBLIVION [/url]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/G4Zg2Hy.gif[/img]


[color=#ff0000]INSTALLATION (very important)[/color]

1) The DLC DRAGONBORN is required (for the “spectral dragon” )....But you can also download an alternative .esp for a configuration without the DLC Dragonborn !

[color=#ff8c00][i] Only for the manual installation:[/i][/color]

2) You have to put the folder « Data » in "...Steam/SteamApps/common/skyrim "

[color=#ff8c00][i] For the manual and the NMM installations:[/i][/color]

3) You must place the new .esp at the bottom of the list in the "Data Files" when you launch the game to obtain the 10 books...(Normally, this is done automatically !)

4) (Only if you have download other mods "Summon...") You must INSTALL the summons (my other mods "summon") ONE BY ONE ! (ALL my mods are STANDALONE !)

You can find the “Spell tome: Summon XXXX Dragon” at Farengar Secret-Fire in Dragonsreach/Fort Dragon (Whiterun/Blancherive) or with an other "Spell Vendor" (ex: Sybille Stentor in the Blue Palace/Palais Bleu in Solitude).

Duration of the summon: 1 hour

5) You can put in your Skyrim.ini ( user / my documents / my games / Skyrim ) the following settings (you can copy / paste the following):


[Camera]

fVanityModeMaxDist=2000.0000
fVanityModeMinDist=10.0000
fMouseWheelZoomMinDelta=0.0050
fMouseWheelZoomSpeed=0.8000
fMouseWheelZoomIncrement=0.01
fMinCurrentZoom=0.001


These settings allow you to see all mounts (of my mods) correctly, whether your character takes his weapon out or not


Mini Dragons are in this [color=#ff0000]Video[/color] from 10'52" ------> to 13'38'' (Mod IV)

->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]aeYNZmWLXYU[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-

[color=#ff0000]Bugs or Problems[/color]

1) You can only have one Follower at a time: if you want a different one (in my other mods), you need to dismiss the first one before you recruit them.

If telling the follower to return at home (With message: “Your companion heads home”) doesn't dismiss him, or if you have "lost" the “active” Follower, you can try this:

Type “²” key to get into console, and type:

set playeranimalcount to 0

2) With [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15524/?]Amazing Follower Tweaks by Dheuster [/url], or other mod with followers, if problem to dismiss the followers, you can uncheck this mod (AFT or other) in the Data Files when you launch the game

3) if your mount disappears (with impossibility to dismount): Zoom out with the scroll wheel or FAST TRAVEL


[color=#ff0000]Credits[/color]

All the bone, naga (Model from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3218604/? ] DigitalLion [/url]), and other dragon models that are rigged to the Ice Wraith skeleton were created and rigged by [color=#ff8c00] Dogtown1[/color] /[url=http://www.facebook.com/pages/Skymomod/514197991944324]Skymomod[/url] in the [url=http://bsnooch.com/forums/index.php?topic=822.0 ]Skyrim Monster Mod version 10 [/url]

The textures are from [color=#ff8c00] lifestorock[/color] in his[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24913 ] Skyrim Immersive Creatures[/url], Versions 2 and 3; and [color=#ff8c00] Bellyache[/color] in [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20889 ]Bellyaches New Dragon Species and Ohdaviing Replacer[/url]
